Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value, which I believe aligns well with your needs and aspirations. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
